articles.description: Existing investors including Iron Pillar, Investcorp, Investment Corporation of Dubai, Ascent Capital and others also participated in the funding round. New investors include E20 Investment Ltd, Mount Judi Ventures and Dallah Albaraka.
articles.content: Online meat delivery company FreshToHome has raised $104 million (Rs 860 crore), led by Amazon Smbhav Venture Fund, amid a tough funding environment for late-stage startups. Existing investors includ… [+4030 chars]

articles.author: ET Online
articles.title: In-bound travellers visiting India can now make local payments using UPI - Economic Times
articles.description: To start with, it will be available to travelers from G-20 countries, at select international airports (Bengaluru, Mumbai and New Delhi). ​​Eligible travellers would be issued Prepaid Payment Instruments (PPI) wallets linked to UPI for making payments at merc…
articles.content: In-bound travellers visiting India can now make local payments using UPI while they are in the country, the Reserve Bank said."Travellers visiting India can now experience the convenience of UPI paym… [+3433 chars]
